Category.name: Custom Events
Category.description: Custom events exposed on the behavior.

Category.name: Gesture
Category.description: Input from the touch screen or the mouse

Category.name: Slide
Category.description: Events generated when a slide is changing.

Category.name: Custom Handlers
Category.description: Custom Handlers exposed on the behavior.

Category.name: Time
Category.description: Handlers exposed on the asset's time.

Property.name: referencednode
Property.description: Original element (e.g. group, component, model) to clone

Handler.name: Set Property
Handler.description: Set a property to a new value.

Handler.name: Fire Event
Handler.description: Fire an event on the target.

Property.name: orthographic
Property.description: Remove all perspective from the camera?

Property.name: position
Property.description: Location in local space

Property.name: rotation
Property.description: Rotation around local axes

Property.name: scale
Property.description: Size adjustments along local axes

Property.name: pivot
Property.description: Offset of the contents away from the local center

Property.name: fov
Property.description: Viewing angle of the camera (how much it can see)

Property.name: clipnear
Property.description: Near distance at which objects disappear

Property.name: clipfar
Property.description: Far distance at which objects disappear

Property.name: scalemode
Property.description: Render more content as the layer expands (same size) or scale up the content (fit)

Property.name: scaleanchor
Property.description: Corner of the content to pin as the layer size changes

Property.name: sourcepath
Property.description: Path to the source of this group

Property.name: scaleu
Property.description: Number of times the image is tiled on the U direction of the material

Property.name: scalev
Property.description: Number of times the image is tiled on the V direction of the material

Property.name: mappingmode
Property.description: How the image is applied to the material

Property.name: tilingmodehorz
Property.description: How the image is tiled in the U direction

Property.name: tilingmodevert
Property.description: How the image is tiled in the V direction

Property.name: rotationuv
Property.description: Rotate the image's coordinates

Property.name: positionu
Property.description: Offset of the image along the U direction of the material

Property.name: positionv
Property.description: Offset of the image along the V direction of the material

Property.name: pivotu
Property.description: Offset the image in the U direction without affecting rotation center

Property.name: pivotv
Property.description: Offset the image in the V direction without affecting rotation center

Property.name: subpresentation
Property.description: Presentation (or plugin) to use instead of the image

Property.name: disabledepthtest
Property.description: Optimize render speed for layers with mostly transparent objects?

Property.name: disabledepthprepass
Property.description: Optimize render speed for layers with low depth complexity

Property.name: progressiveaa
Property.description: Improves the visual quality when no items are moving

Property.name: multisampleaa
Property.description: Improves geometry quality, e.g. silhouettes.

Property.name: temporalaa
Property.description: Improve overall quality using camera jittering and frame blending?

Property.name: background
Property.description: The color to use for the layer each frame

Property.name: backgroundcolor
Property.description: The background color for the layer

Property.name: blendtype
Property.description: Mode of blending between this layer and layers below. Modes marked with * are available only with HW supporting advanced blending modes.

Property.name: horzfields
Property.description: Properties to use to control the horizontal size and placement

Property.name: left
Property.description: Distance between presentation and layer left edges

Property.name: leftunits
Property.description: Left distance is percent of overall width or absolute pixels

Property.name: width
Property.description: Overall layer width

Property.name: widthunits
Property.description: Width is percent of overall width or absolute pixels

Property.name: right
Property.description: Distance between presentation and layer right edges

Property.name: rightunits
Property.description: Right distance is percent of overall width or absolute pixels

Property.name: vertfields
Property.description: Properties to use to control the vertical size and placement

Property.name: top
Property.description: Distance between presentation and layer top edges.

Property.name: topunits
Property.description: Top distance is percent of overall height or absolute pixels

Property.name: height
Property.description: Overall layer height.

Property.name: heightunits
Property.description: Height is percent of overall height or absolute pixels

Property.name: bottom
Property.description: Distance between presentation and layer bottom edges

Property.name: bottomunits
Property.description: Bottom distance is percent of overall height or absolute pixels

Property.name: sourcepath
Property.description: Presentation (or plugin) to render for this layer

Property.name: aostrength
Property.description: Amount of ambient occlusion shading to apply

Property.name: aodistance
Property.description: Size of the ambient occlusion shading

Property.name: aosoftness
Property.description: Magnitude of the blurring used to soften shading

Property.name: aobias
Property.description: Remove AO from flat surfaces to prevent artifacts

Property.name: aosamplerate
Property.description: Quality of AO sampling

Property.name: aodither
Property.description: Use close-range detail AO

Property.name: shadowstrength
Property.description: Amount of shadowing to apply

Property.name: shadowdist
Property.description: Maximum distance to ray march for shadows test

Property.name: shadowsoftness
Property.description: Amount of softening of the shadow edges

Property.name: shadowbias
Property.description: Remove self-shadowing from flat surfaces

Property.name: lightprobe
Property.description: Image used for image-based lighting and reflections

Property.name: probebright
Property.description: Amount of light emitted by the light probe.

Property.name: fastibl
Property.description: Use a faster approximation to image-based lighting

Property.name: probehorizon
Property.description: Upper limit for horizon darkening of the light probe

Property.name: probefov
Property.description: Image source FOV for the case of using a camera-source as the IBL probe

Property.name: lightprobe2
Property.description: Image to blend over the primary light probe

Property.name: probe2fade
Property.description: Blend amount between the primary and seconary probes

Property.name: probe2window
Property.description: Texture-U window size used for the moving window (for scrolling textures

Property.name: probe2pos
Property.description: Texture-U window offset used for the moving window

Property.name: scope
Property.description: Portion of the scene graph lit by this light; no value results in entire layer being affected.

Property.name: lighttype
Property.description: Type of illumination to use

Property.name: position
Property.description: Location in local space

Property.name: rotation
Property.description: Rotation around local axes

Property.name: scale
Property.description: Size adjustments along local axes

Property.name: pivot
Property.description: Offset of the contents away from the local center

Property.name: lightdiffuse
Property.description: Color of diffuse lighting effect

Property.name: lightspecular
Property.description: Color of specular lighting highlights

Property.name: lightambient
Property.description: Color of unlit areas (black for none)

Property.name: brightness
Property.description: Strength of the light

Property.name: linearfade
Property.description: Falloff of the point light

Property.name: expfade
Property.description: Additional falloff

Property.name: areawidth
Property.description: Width of the surface of the area light

Property.name: areaheight
Property.description: Height of the surface of the area light

Property.name: castshadow
Property.description: Enable shadow casting for this light

Property.name: shdwfactor
Property.description: Factor used to darken shadows

Property.name: shdwfilter
Property.description: Width of the blur filter on the shadow map

Property.name: shdwmapres
Property.description: Resolution of shadow map (powers of two)

Property.name: shdwbias
Property.description: Slight offset to avoid self-shadowing artifacts

Property.name: shdwmapfar
Property.description: Affects the maximum distance for the shadow depth map

Property.name: shdwmapfov
Property.description: Affects the field of view of the shadow camera

Property.name: lightmapindirect
Property.description: Image providing indirect lighty values for GI

Property.name: lightmapradiosity
Property.description: Image providing directional light values

Property.name: lightmapshadow
Property.description: Baked Shadow map

Property.name: iblprobe
Property.description: IBL probe to use in place of the layer probe for this material

Property.name: shaderlighting
Property.description: Light model

Property.name: blendmode
Property.description: How this material blends with content behind it. Modes marked with * are available only with HW supporting advanced blending modes.

Property.name: diffuse
Property.description: Color when lit from any direction

Property.name: diffusemap
Property.description: Image to multiply with diffuse color

Property.name: diffusemap2
Property.description: Image to multiply with diffuse color

Property.name: diffusemap3
Property.description: Image to multiply with diffuse color

Property.name: specularreflection
Property.description: Image to use as a faked reflection

Property.name: speculartint
Property.description: Coloration applied to specular reflections

Property.name: specularamount
Property.description: Amount of shine/gloss

Property.name: specularmap
Property.description: Image to vary the specular amount across the material

Property.name: specularmodel
Property.description: Equation to use when calculating specular highlights for CG lights

Property.name: specularroughness
Property.description: Softening applied to reflections and highlights

Property.name: fresnelPower
Property.description: Damping of head-on reflections

Property.name: ior
Property.description: Angle at which fresnel reflection damping applies

Property.name: bumpmap
Property.description: Grayscale image simulating roughness in the lighting

Property.name: normalmap
Property.description: Special RGB image describing surface roughness

Property.name: bumpamount
Property.description: Strength of bump/normal map effect

Property.name: displacementmap
Property.description: Grayscale image used to offset vertices of the geometry

Property.name: displaceamount
Property.description: Distance to offset vertices

Property.name: opacity
Property.description: Visibility of the geometry for this material.

Property.name: opacitymap
Property.description: Image to vary the opacity across the material

Property.name: emissivecolor
Property.description: Color of self-illumination for this material

Property.name: emissivepower
Property.description: Amount of self-illumination for this material (will not light other objects)

Property.name: emissivemap
Property.description: Image to vary the emissive power across the material

Property.name: emissivemap2
Property.description: Second image to modulate the emissive power across the material

Property.name: translucencymap
Property.description: Grayscale image controlling how much light can pass through the material from behind

Property.name: referencedmaterial
Property.description: Material to use all settings from

Property.name: sourcepath
Property.description: Geometry to use for this model

Property.name: tessellation
Property.description: Type of tessellation to subdivide the geometry

Property.name: edgetess
Property.description: Max Tessellation amount

Property.name: innertess
Property.description: Min Tessellation amount

Property.name: position
Property.description: Location in local space

Property.name: rotation
Property.description: Rotation around local axes

Property.name: scale
Property.description: Size adjustments along local axes

Property.name: pivot
Property.description: Offset of the contents away from the local center

Property.name: opacity
Property.description: How much the element (and its children) occlude items behind them

Property.name: rotationorder
Property.description: Rotation Order

Property.name: opacity
Property.description: How much the element (and its children) occlude items behind them

Property.name: sourcepath
Property.description: Path data to use for this path

Property.name: width
Property.description: The size of the stroke in local units

Property.name: pathtype
Property.description: The type of this path

Property.name: linearerror
Property.description: Amount of tessellation work done on the CPU before GPU tessellation is involved

Property.name: edgetessamount
Property.description: Amount of GPU tessellation along the length of the path.

Property.name: innertessamount
Property.description: Amount of GPU tessellation across the stroke of the path.

Property.name: begincap
Property.description: Set this to "Taper" to finely taper the beginning of your stroke over a specified distance

Property.name: begincapoffset
Property.description: Control the length of the taper

Property.name: begincapopacity
Property.description: Control the opacity of the taper

Property.name: begincapwidth
Property.description: Control the size of the taper

Property.name: endcap
Property.description: Set this to "Taper" to finely taper the end of your stroke over a specified distance

Property.name: endcapoffset
Property.description: Control the length of the taper

Property.name: endcapopacity
Property.description: Control the opacity of the taper

Property.name: endcapwidth
Property.description: Control the size of the taper

Property.name: paintstyle
Property.description: The style of this path

Property.name: particletype
Property.description: Type of particle System

Property.name: opacity
Property.description: How much the element (and its children) occlude items behind them

Property.name: maxparticles
Property.description: Max count of particles

Property.name: particlesize
Property.description: Render size of particle

Property.name: lifetime
Property.description: Particle lifetime before it dies

Property.name: bgcolorenable
Property.description: Clear the contents to a solid color before each frame?

Property.name: backgroundcolor
Property.description: Color to use for the background

Property.name: playmode
Property.description: Action to take when reaching the end of all timebars on this slide

Property.name: playthroughto
Property.description: Slide to go to after this one

Property.name: initialplaystate
Property.description: Do animations start when coming to this slide?

Event.name: onSlideEnter
Event.description: Fired when the slide is changing

Event.name: onSlideExit
Event.description: Fired when the slide is changing

Handler.name: Go to Time
Handler.description: Set the current time on the component.

Argument.name: Pause
Argument.description: Pause playback at the new time?

Handler.name: Go to Slide
Handler.description: Go to a specified slide of the component.

Handler.name: Next Slide
Handler.description: Activate the next slide of the component.

Handler.name: Previous Slide
Handler.description: Activate the previous slide of the component.

Handler.name: Preceding Slide
Handler.description: Activate the slide that was previously active.

Property.name: textstring
Property.description: Text String

Property.name: textcolor
Property.description: Text Color

Property.name: size
Property.description: Font Size

Property.name: horzalign
Property.description: Horizontal Alignment

Property.name: vertalign
Property.description: Vertical Alignment
